Package hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseActivity
    Class to collect common methods of activities and manage dependency injection.
    BaseActivityWithKnockDecoder
    Classes implementing this abstract class can receive detected signals from KnockDecoder module.
    BrowseFriendsActivity
    This class is responsible for displaying users, not only friends.
    CodesActivity
    This activity provide code operations.
    CodeSettingActivity
    This activity controls the code settings.
    FriendsActivity
    This class is responsible for displaying friends represented by list of cards.
    KnockGraphActivity
    This class visualizes the strength of the knock with a graph based on the set values (short unit time, level).
    MainScreenActivity
    The application's main screen.
    MainSettingsActivity
    This Activity is a wrapper for the setting's fragment.
    MessageSendingActivity
    Activity class to send messages.
    PermissionDeniedActivity
    This activity is used when the user denies a permission which was required by the application.
    ProfileActivity
    This activity is responsible for displaying the user's data and managing the changes.
    SplashActivity
    Splasch screnn activity.
